xs.$description: select.height.xs — Extra small select height (30px). Use for: compact forms, inline selects, space-constrained UIs. Matches xs input height.

sm.$description: select.height.sm — Small select height (36px). Use for: standard density forms, filter bars, secondary selects. Matches sm input height.

md.$description: select.height.md — Medium select height (42px). DEFAULT. Use for: most form selects, settings, primary data entry. Matches md input height.

lg.$description: select.height.lg — Large select height (48px). Use for: touch-optimized forms, prominent selects, hero sections. Matches lg input height.

xl.$description: select.height.xl — Extra large select height (60px). Use for: high-emphasis selects, marketing forms, maximum touch targets. Matches xl input height.

xs.$description: select.padding.horizontal.xs — Extra small horizontal select padding (10px). Compact padding for xs selects. Leaves room for dropdown icon.

sm.$description: select.padding.horizontal.sm — Small horizontal select padding (12px). Standard padding for sm selects and efficient layouts.

md.$description: select.padding.horizontal.md — Medium horizontal select padding (12px). DEFAULT. Same as sm - compact but comfortable for most use cases.

lg.$description: select.padding.horizontal.lg — Large horizontal select padding (16px). More generous padding for lg selects with better text breathing room.

xl.$description: select.padding.horizontal.xl — Extra large horizontal select padding (16px). Same as lg - comfortable padding for xl selects.

borderRadius.$description: select.borderRadius — Select input border radius (4px). Matches standard input field radius for form consistency.

borderWidth.$description: select.borderWidth — Select input border width (1px). Standard form control border. Clear boundary without visual heaviness.

xs.$description: select.fontSize.xs — Extra small select font size (12px). Compact text for xs selects. Use for dense forms or secondary controls.

sm.$description: select.fontSize.sm — Small select font size (14px). Standard text for most select inputs. Readable and space-efficient.

md.$description: select.fontSize.md — Medium select font size (16px). DEFAULT. Body text size for comfortable reading. Most common for primary forms.

lg.$description: select.fontSize.lg — Large select font size (16px). Same as md - maintains readability without growing too large.

xl.$description: select.fontSize.xl — Extra large select font size (18px). Larger text for prominent selects or accessibility focus.

borderRadius.$description: select.dropdown.borderRadius — Dropdown menu border radius (4px). Matches select input radius. Creates consistent, connected feel when open.

shadow.$description: select.dropdown.shadow — Dropdown menu shadow. Medium shadow provides elevation and separation from page content. Indicates floating layer.

padding.$description: select.dropdown.padding — Dropdown menu inner padding (10px). Small padding around the options list. Options have their own padding.

maxHeight.$description: select.dropdown.maxHeight — Dropdown menu maximum height (300px). Limits dropdown size for long option lists. Enables scrolling when exceeded.

zIndex.$description: select.dropdown.zIndex — Dropdown z-index stacking level (200). Above most page content but below modals. Standard popover layer.

horizontal.$description: select.option.padding.horizontal — Option horizontal padding (12px). Comfortable padding for option text. Wider click/tap target than text alone.

vertical.$description: select.option.padding.vertical — Option vertical padding (10px). Creates comfortable row height for options. Good for keyboard navigation and touch.

borderRadius.$description: select.option.borderRadius — Option border radius (2px). Subtle rounding for hover/selected state backgrounds. Creates soft highlight effect.

duration.$description: select.transition.duration — Select transition duration (100ms). Fast transitions for dropdown open/close and option hover states.

easing.$description: select.transition.easing — Select transition easing (ease-out). Smooth deceleration for dropdown appearance and state changes.

size.$description: select.icon.size — Select chevron icon size (16px). Dropdown indicator arrow. Sized to be visible but not dominant.

spacing.$description: select.icon.spacing — Spacing between text and icon (10px). Separates selected text from chevron indicator.
